text: class Monster attr_accessor id, position, healh, attributes def attack(humans) attacked_human = humans.min { |h| abs(h.position - monster.position) attacked_human.health -= min(attributes.atk - attacked_human.atiributes.dfs, 0) end def render; end def physics; end end class Human attr_accessor id, position, health attributes def render; end def physics; end end
